decision_conditions: Retrospective planning permission is granted in accordance with the submitted plans and supporting documents, as follows: 010.24 - SD01 - Covering Letter; 010.24 - 001 - Site Location Plan; 010.24 - 010 - Site Block Plan as existing; 010.24 - 011 - Site Block Plan as proposed; 010.24 - 020 - Roof Plan as existing; 010.24 - 021 - Roof Plan as proposed; 010.24 - 030 - Elevations as existing; 010.24 - 031 - Elevations as proposed; 010.24 - 041 - Sections as existing & as proposed; 010.24 - 100 - Ground Floor Plan as existing; 010.24 - 101 - Ground Floor Plan as proposed; 1930-AF-00001-01 - Plant Noise Assessment
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The rating noise level (LAr,Tr) of the individual and combined maximum noise emitted by plant, ducting and equipment at the development site shall be lower than the lowest existing background sound level by at least 10dBA, as measured at/ calculated to the nearest and most affected noise sensitive premises at surrounding premises, as assessed in accordance with BS4142:2014 +A1 2019, with all machinery operating together at maximum capacity. At non-residential noise sensitive receivers, the noise levels emitted at the site shall not exceed the noise limits specified in BS8233:2014.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise, in accordance with Policy D14 of the London Plan (2021), Policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft Local Plan (Regulation 19).
description: Installation of external refrigeration plant and associated enabling works including new bunded concrete pad and steel support frame for services (retrospective).
subdivision_of_building: External area to Southeast adjacent existing plant room.
